name: Frogkowski
description:
FROGKOWSKI

A game about the famous frog philosopher Frogkowski, help him search for his bottle before he runs out of life span while you hear his thoughs about the limitation of time.

HOW TO PLAY

Run through the obstacle course searching for your vine bottle, but be careful, your time is limited and will only be increased by taking the pipes. Be fast and don't run out of time!

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

MADE BY

Programmer - Miguel Ángel Hoyos Ramírez

Art - Juan Pablo Posada Noreña

Music / SFX - Juan José Ospina Ortega
